title: Number Font
content:
Im designing a clock and I am looking for a nice typeface to use for the numbers. I would like to use a font that has a lot of character to each number, while not becoming to fancy or overbearing. This clock will be in a semi-modern location but I would like to keep a link to the past (or something pretty classic). Please let me know what you think.

 [‹ The right font](http://web.archive.org/web/20081203180004/http:/www.typophile.com/node/39051 "Go to previous forum topic") [Spotted any good organic food fonts? ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20081203180004/http:/www.typophile.com/node/17373 "Go to next forum topic")
